Caffeino Classic.name: Caffeino Classic
features: Milk frother for creating creamy cappuccinos and lattes.
Removable water reservoir for easy refilling.
Caffeino Classic.description: The Caffeino Classic by EliteBrew is a powerful espresso machine that delivers rich and flavorful shots of espresso with the convenience of a built-in milk frother, perfect for indulging in your favorite cafe-style beverages at home.

BeanPresso.name: BeanPresso
features: Compact design ideal for small spaces or travel.
Compatible with various coffee pods for quick and easy brewing.
Auto-off feature for energy efficiency and safety.
BeanPresso.description: The BeanPresso by FreshBrew is a compact single-serve coffee maker that allows you to enjoy a fresh cup of coffee effortlessly using your favorite coffee pods, making it the perfect companion for those with limited space or always on the go.

BrewBlend Pro.name: BrewBlend Pro
features: Adjustable brew strength for customized coffee flavor.
Large LCD display with programmable timer for convenient brewing.
Anti-drip system to prevent messes on the warming plate.
BrewBlend Pro.description: The BrewBlend Pro by MasterRoast offers a superior brewing experience with adjustable brew strength, programmable timer, and anti-drip system, ensuring a perfectly brewed cup of coffee every time, making mornings more enjoyable.

SteamGenie.name: SteamGenie
features: Classic Italian stovetop design for rich and aromatic coffee.
Durable stainless steel construction for long-lasting performance.
Available in multiple sizes to suit different brewing needs.
SteamGenie.description: The SteamGenie by KitchenWiz is a traditional stovetop coffee maker that harnesses the essence of Italian coffee culture, crafted with durable stainless steel and delivering a rich, authentic coffee experience with every brew.

AeroBlend Max.name: AeroBlend Max
features: Dual-functionality for brewing coffee and espresso.
Built-in burr grinder for fresh coffee grounds.
Adjustable temperature and brew strength settings for personalized beverages.
AeroBlend Max.description: The AeroBlend Max by AeroGen is a versatile coffee and espresso combo machine that combines the convenience of brewing both coffee and espresso with a built-in grinder, allowing you to enjoy the perfect cup of your preferred caffeinated delight with ease.
